plugin.name: Komendy_przejsc
plugin.author: Froniu
plugin.purpose: Komendy przejsc bindowane pod klawisz Ctrl+X

trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wyjscie z kurhanu pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wespnij sie na gore"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie do kurhanu pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz w krzaki"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przeplyniecie na poludnie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przeplyn na poludnie"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wdrapanie sie na glaz pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wdrap sie na glaz"

trigger.match: zrecznie wspina sie na znajdujaca sie powyzej polke skalna
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na polke skalna pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wespnij sie na polke"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przeplyniecie na polnoc pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przeplyn na polnoc"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przeskoczenie wyrwy pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przeskocz wyrwe"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie do pieczary pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz do pieczary"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Czolganie sie na poludnie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przeczolgaj sie na poludnie"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Czolganie sie na polnoc pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przeczolgaj sie na polnoc"

trigger.match: lapie za korzen i szybko wspina sie po skale
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie po korzeniu pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wdrap sie po korzeniu"

trigger.match: sprawnie sie podciagajac wychodzi ze studni
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie po sznurze pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wdrap sie po sznurze"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na prom pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wskocz na prom"

trigger.match: przywiera plasko do ziemi i wczolguje sie w szczeline
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w szczeline pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przecisnij sie przez szczeline"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Obejscie budynku pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","obejdz budynek"

trigger.match: nabiera powietrza, zamyka oczy i nagle znika!
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w sciane pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz we wschodnia sciane"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie do skavenow pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","poklon sie statui"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wyjscie ze skavenow pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przekrec czaszke"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie ze statku pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz ze statku"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na dol pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz na dol"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na mur pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wespnij sie na mur"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na dol pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz na dol"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przeskoczenie wyrwy pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przeskocz wyrwe"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie do baszty pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz do baszty"

trigger.match: kieruje sie w strone krzakow i po chwili daje w
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w krzaki pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz w krzaki"

trigger.match: ostroznie wchodzi do gory lapiac sie kolejnych szczebli drabin
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie po drabinie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz po drabinie"

trigger.match: ostroznie schodzi na dol lapiac sie kolejnych szczebli drabiny
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie po drabinie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz po drabinie"

trigger.match: smialo zaczyna schodzic w dol i po chwili znika ci z oczu
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na dol pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz na dol"

trigger.match: chwyta za jeden z konarow i zaczyna przesuwac pien
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przesuniecie pnia pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przesun pien"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w szczeline pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przecisnij sie przez szczeline"

trigger.match: staje niepewnie na kamiennej plycie, i nagle zapada sie w dol!
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na plyte pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz na plyte"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Dotkniecie slupa pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","dotknij slupa"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie po drabinie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz po drabinie"

trigger.match: skacze do studni, w nieprzenikniona, czarna czelusc
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Skok do studni pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wskocz do studni"

trigger.match: przeskakuje przez krawedz studni i znika z twych oczu
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Studnia pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz do studni;przecisnij sie przez otwor "

trigger.match: bez trudu wchodzi na podest... traci rownowage z niewiadomego powodu...
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie do grobowca pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz na podest;wejdz do grobowca"

trigger.match: znika nagle w jednej ze scian
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na dol pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz w sciane;n;zeskocz na glaz;przeskocz na glaz;wskocz do wody;zanurkuj pod wode;otwor;n;wespnij sie na gore;wespnij sie do gory"

trigger.match: przesuwa plyte i wydostaje sie przez otwor w suficie na gore
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przesuniecie plyty pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przesun plyte"

trigger.match: otwiera klape i wydostaje sie przez otwor w suficie na gore
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Otwarcie klapy pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","otworz klape"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie do tunelu pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz do tunelu"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Nurkowanie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zanurkuj"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na brzeg pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zeskocz"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na statek drabinie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","s+"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wspiecie sie po linie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wespnij sie po linie"

trigger.match: nagle wraca na swoja pierwotna pozycje
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie do KK pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","podwaz czarny glaz"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na sciezke pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wdrap sie na sciezke"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na dol pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zsun sie na dol"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie na dol pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz na dol"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na gore pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wespnij sie na gore"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie do otworu pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wslizgnij sie do otworu"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie do rozpadliny pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zejdz do rozpadliny;przecisnij sie przez szczeline"

trigger.match: by po chwili zsunac sie po nich na dol
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie po linie pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zsun sie po linie"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w krzaki pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz w krzaki"

trigger.match: spycha jedno z czolen na wode
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przeprawa przez rzeke pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przepraw sie przez rzeke"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na tratwe pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wskocz na tratwe"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Zejscie z tratwy pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","zeskocz z tratwy"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie na tratwe pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wskocz na tratwe"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w szczeline pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz do szczeliny"

trigger.match: podaza przez lustro wodospadu na zewnatrz
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez wodospad pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przejdz przez wodospad"

trigger.match: wchodzi do szczeliny miedzy glazami i znika w jej mroku
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Wejscie w szczeline pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","przecisnij sie przez szczeline"

world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez wodospad pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+X","wejdz do jeziorka;przejdz przez wodospad"

trigger.match: Plytki zostaly wykonane z marmuru w czarnym kolorze. Wyraznie odcinaja sie od reszty kamieni, jakimi wybrukowano most. Ich rozmiar odpowiada dokladnie rozmiarowi stopy ogra. Dostrzegasz, iz sa lekko zaglebione w powierzchni mostu.
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez pulapke na moscie na POLUDNIE pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez pulapke na moscie na POLNOC pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+Y " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+Y","przejdz po czarnych plytkach na polnoc" accelerator "Ctrl+X","przejdz po czarnych plytkach na poludnie"

trigger.match: Plytki zostaly wykonane z marmuru w czerwonym kolorze. Wyraznie odcinaja sie od reszty kamieni, jakimi wybrukowano most. Ich rozmiar odpowiada dokladnie rozmiarowi stopy ogra. Dostrzegasz, iz sa lekko zaglebione w powierzchni mostu.
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez pulapke na moscie na POLUDNIE pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez pulapke na moscie na POLNOC pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+Y " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+Y","przejdz po czerwonych plytkach na polnoc" accelerator "Ctrl+X","przejdz po czerwonych plytkach na poludnie"

trigger.match: Plytki zostaly wykonane z marmuru w bialym kolorze. Wyraznie odcinaja sie od reszty kamieni, jakimi wybrukowano most. Ich rozmiar odpowiada dokladnie rozmiarowi stopy ogra. Dostrzegasz, iz sa lekko zaglebione w powierzchni mostu.
trigger.send: world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez pulapke na moscie na POLUDNIE pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+X " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 world.tell " ==---> " world.notecolourRGB &hB469FF,&h82004B world.tell " Przejscie przez pulapke na moscie na POLNOC pod klawiszem " world.notecolourRGB &h82004B,&hB469FF world.tell "CTRL+Y " world.notecolour = 11 world.note " <---==" world.notecolour = 11 accelerator "Ctrl+Y","przejdz po bialych plytkach na polnoc" accelerator "Ctrl+X","przejdz po bialych plytkach na poludnie"
